english.segment1: I watched you fade away, into a sea of taillights. My eyes still strained to this day.. Evidence of who we were, left here along the way. I see the truth in the tree.
english.segment2: Ill free you, fall away. Ill free you, fade away. (x 2)
english.segment3: The world just stopped its pull, and I could almost hear you, crying out through the noise.. The things I thought I knew, so close to understanding. But now Im dumb to the wise.
english.segment4: Ill free you, fall away. Ill free you, fade away. (x 2)
english.segment5: I see her, perfectly clothed in white..my eyes burn..
english.segment6: Ill free you, fall away. Ill free you, fade away. (x 2)
